sentences.en: A rotor from the engine makes the wheels of the car turn.
sentences.cn: 发动机的轮子使车轮转动.

sentences.en: As the rotor turns clockwise the charge is sealed off and compression begins.
sentences.cn: 当转子顺时针方向转动时,送进的气团就被封闭,并开始压缩.

sentences.en: Chris Retzler has built a prototype of a machine called the wave rotor.
sentences.cn: 克里斯·雷茨勒已制造出了一种叫波转子的机器的样机。

sentences.en: Flexible rotor balancing is a practical and key technique in modern industry.
sentences.cn: 柔性转子动平衡一直是现代工业中一项很实用的关键技术.

sentences.en: It enables the rotor with constant speed for maintaining steady output voltage.
sentences.cn: 它使转子能以恒定速度转动,保持输出电压稳定.

sentences.en: It is best to allow the rotor to rotate freely.
The crankshaft makes three rotations for each rotation of the rotor.
sentences.cn: 转子每转一周,曲轴转3周.

sentences.en: The diameters of the rotor and the stator are limited by mechanical stresses.
sentences.cn: 转子和定子的直径受到机械强度的限制.

sentences.en: The motion of the rotor can be balanced completely with rotating counterweights attached to the crankshaft.
sentences.cn: 使用连接在曲轴上的转动平衡块,转子的运动就能完全平衡.

sentences.en: The rotating parts consist of the rim, web, bearings, shaft, and rotor portion of the motor.
sentences.cn: 旋转部分由转子体 、 辐壁 、 轴承 、 轴以及陀螺马达的转子部分组成.

sentences.en: The rotor cataracts water over the top of the machines.
sentences.cn: 回转轮将水从机器顶上注入.

sentences.en: The rotor connected the various ports in the stainless - steel valve block.
sentences.cn: 转动件和不锈钢阀块各个孔相连.

sentences.en: The rotor has recesses in its three faces between the lobes.
sentences.cn: 转子在其凸角之间的三个面上有凹槽.

sentences.en: The shaft of the turbine is coupled to the rotor of the generator.
sentences.cn: 汽轮机的轴与发电机转子相连结.

words.tran_cn: 旋转的；使回转的；轮流的；引起旋转的
[电][机][动力]转子；水平旋翼；旋转体

phrases.tran_cn: 鼠笼型转子；短路式转子

实心转子；整块转子；整锻转子
尾桨；直升机尾旋翼；尾部螺旋桨

trans.tran_en: a part of a machine that turns around on a central point
